Wenno

About Us

Wenno USA offers animal figurines licensed by National Geographic to transport you to the depths of the oceans, the edges of the wilderness, and even to the Jurassic Age of the Dinosaurs. With a classic selection of animals devised into four popular categories including sea life, farm, zoo, and dinosaurs, you'll soon see why our products bring smiles to so many children! With astounding detail and real-life features, each animal figurine is a testimony of the craftsmanship we stand behind. We take pride in that fact that our toys are not only fun but mentally engaging as well! If your child has a love for wildlife and the animal world, these figurines will spark the joy of wonder and entertainment.
